amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $37,450,000 within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of climate change research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $37,450,000 within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of climate change research.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
